p: Andrographolide is a diterpenoid isolated from Andrographis paniculata, which has been employed in treating various diseases such as cancer and inflammatory diseases [ 147]. Apart from anti-inflammatory activity, Andrographolide exhibits immunomodulatory effect by increasing the level of cytotoxic T cells, NK cells, phagocytic cells, and shows the broad spectral antiviral activity against various deadliest viruses [ 148]. Recent computational analysis data suggest that Andrographolide and its derivatives chrysin-7-O-Î²-glucuronide might produce therapeutic effects against SARS-CoV-2 pneumonia infections.
